product_name: Marmot Mdot Grid Tee - Men's - 2012 Closeout
long_description: Great for climbing or scrambling due to its stretch, the men's Marmot Mdot Grid Tee feels as soft as cotton, yet is made of polyester/spandex for sun protection and quick-drying performance. Lightweight, breathable stretch-knit fabric wicks moisture and offers UPF 50+ sun protection. Marmot Mdot Grid Tee offers reflective logos to increase your visibility on pre-dawn starts. Tag-free neckline. Closeout.
short_description: Great for climbing or scrambling due to its stretch, the men's Marmot Mdot Grid Tee feels as soft as cotton, yet is made of polyester/spandex for sun protection and quick-drying performance.
